1. Decode: 01000011 01101111 01101101 01110000 01110101 01110100 01100101 01110010

01000011 = 67  = C
01101111 = 111 = o
01101101 = 109 = m
01110000 = 112 = p
01110101 = 117 = u
01110100 = 116 = t
01100101 = 101 = e
01110010 = 114 = r

2. a) U+0023
3 = 0011
2 = 0010

0010 0011

b) U+003C
C = 1100
3 = 0011

0011 1100

c) U+2211
1 = 0001
2 = 0010

0010 0010 0001 0001

= 11100010 10001000 10010001

d) U+2265
5 = 0101
6 = 0110
2 = 0010

0010 0010 0110 0101

= 11100010 10001001 10100101

3. a) 01000000
0100 0000
= U+40

b) 11000011 10111000
1100 0011 1011 1000 = U+C3B8

c) 11100010 10000101 10110100
0010 00010 10100 = U+20AC
